package.description: This package provides header files and libraries which implement a framework for generic handling of tele-operation devices. Different types of tele-operation sources can be implemented as sub-classes of the provided TeleopSource class (e.g. keyboards, joysticks, etc.), and these can be used by different types of tele-operation sinks (e.g. mobile robot bases, robot arms, pan-tilt units, robot swarms, etc.).
package.author: Kevin LeBlanc
